title: The Collage Atlas
notes: Native controller support. **Decky Plugin: Not Supported**. **2.0 Standalone: Works out of the box**.
description: The Collage Atlas invites you on a journey through an entirely hand-drawn picture-book dream-world. From the grass beneath your fee, to the butterflies dancing in the air, to the floating islands drifting overhead - every little detail has been lovingly-crafted with pen & ink on paper.
